column5: I produced one of the first launch ads for them and now I have five of them.  http://www.apple.com/30-years/

30 years ago I was working for a radio station in Kingston.  Our copywriter got rid of her typewriter and got a Mac with a printer, it definitely made her job easier.  Soon the teletype machine was replaced by a Mac as well.
we had to buy one so we could clone the chips to make many more apple clone computer
I switched several years ago after going to an iPod, then came the iPhone 3, (3GS),(4GS),>iPad>iPad II>macBook. macBook Air. Totally hooked on a great system. Can't imagine going back to MS/android.
for the aniversary Apple finally decided to join forces woth Microsoft to create the best ever operationg system: WINPPLE
